partner_p_1_1: Longrich is a company that has existed since 1986 and is present in more than 183 countries around the world, including Cameroon, Benin, Gabon, Congo Kinshasa.
partner_p_1_2:
It has several research and development centers, including 5 in Asia, 1 in the United States, 2 in Europe and 1 in Africa, more precisely in Nigeria.

It is what we calls a manufacturing company, that is to say it manufactures products for other companies.

So that you understand better, let's take the case of breweries for example, these have the license to make juices such as Coca-Cola¬©, Sprite¬©. The breweries therefore constitute a manufacturing enterprise for The Coca-Cola¬© Company.
partner_p_1_3: In the image below you will find the companies for which Longrich manufactures the products.
partner_p_1_4:
Surely, you have recognized several brands from your daily life such as Carrefour, Unilever, GSK from Sensodyne and many others‚Ä¶

And yes, know that each time you consume one of these products, you consume products manufactured by Longrich.

You can imagine that to be a manufacturing company and produce quality products, you need to have certain international certifications, and this is the case with Longrich.

Longrich has several certifications which make its products quality and organic products, you will find some of them below:

  • ISO 9001 certification: International Quality System
  • ISO 14001 certification: International environmental protection system
  • HALAL certification
  • HACCP ‚Äì Certification & GMP Certification
< p>You will find some products and their benefits in the images below.
partner_p_1_5:
I'm sure I didn't even need to tell you that since the products you already consume are of good quality and you can attest to that üòú.

Now that you know who is Longrich, you must surely be wondering what Longrich can do for you
partner_p_2_1:
Longrich has planned 10 bonuses for anyone who recommends its products or its partnership.

But before telling you about these bonuses, I will tell you about the most important element at Longrich: the PV .
The PV for Product Value (value of a product in French) is the currency of Longrich.

You obtain PV for all good deeds in Longrich. That is to say when you buy a product to consume it, you receive PV, or when you recommend Longrich to a person and they become a member, you also receive PV.

Each PV is equivalent to 600 XAF.

The first bonus at Longrich is the RESALE BONUS.

This is the profit you receive each time you sell a Longrich product. For example, if you buy a Longrich product for 1,000 XAF and decide to resell it for 5,000 (Yes, you have the right to do so), your resale bonus will be 4,000 XAF.

You don't you have no constraints on the resale price of your product, however the latter must not be lower than the purchase price.

The second bonus is the SPONSORSHIP BONUS.

It This is the bonus you receive every time you make a good recommendation.
A good recommendation is when you recommend Longrich to a person and they become a member.

When this happens, Longrich pays you 6,000 XAF the week following the registration of the new member and on top of that, you receive 4PV minimum for each new member in your team.

It's probably still unclear for you so I'll take a concrete example.

In your directory there are surely more than 200 numbers, therefore more than 200 people you know.

If out of the 200 people, you recommend Longrich to 50 people and they decide to become a member then in one week you will have won 300,000 XAF just for talking about Longrich.

I can already see your eyes shining ü§ëü§ë

The 3rd bonus is the PERFORMANCE BONUS.

It is obtained when the members of your team have completed their VPs for a week.
So, if the 50 people you registered made product purchases, they received PVs and it is on these PVs that you will receive your bonus.

It varies between 8 and 12% and is paid every Thursday depending on the PV.
I know that one of your dreams is to be able to earn money without having to work! here is the BONUS that makes this dream come true.

Just because you recommended Longrich, you find yourself with a source of passive income for life.

If the 50 people make a total of 10,000 VP, you will receive minimum 10000*0.08*600. Or 480,000 XAF in one week.
partner_p_2_2: Surely you are saying to yourself that this is not possible but let me prove you otherwise. In this image you will find one of my ‚ÄúGreen Thursdays‚Äù received by transfer to my UBA account.
partner_p_2_3:
Yes in one week I received 207,320 XAF üòé and if I can receive then why not YOU?

The next bonus is the DEVELOPMENT BONUS.

It n is no different from the performance bonus. It is 10%.

It is paid for each group of 60PV therefore for the previous 10000 PV, there are 166 groups of 60PV
Your bonus will be 166*60*01* 600 or 597,600 XAF.

Just with these 3 bonuses we are already at 1,371,600 Just for telling 50 people about Longrich.

Now imagine if every week you received such an amount by bank transfer. ü§ëü§ë
Imagine if you have more than 100 people in your team and they work like you.
What dream will you not be able to achieve?

There I am sure that your eyes shine ü§©ü§©
partner_p_2_4:
There are still 3 other bonuses but we will see them later, I will let you digest these first 3üòâ.
But before telling you why Longrich is a business for you, you will find the 4 bonuses in kind from Longrich ü§≠
partner_p_3_1:
ZERO TAX: At Longrich, you will never pay tax on the purchase of a product because the company has already paid for you.

MULTITUDE OF CUSTOMERS: Because we use toothpaste , soaps, sanitary towels and oil, you will always have people to offer Longrich products to, therefore earning money.

PASSIVE INCOME FROM YOUR SOFA: As in the example of bonus, you have the possibility with Longrich to earn money even while sleeping. In addition, compared to other businesses, here you can progress at your own pace without risk of losing your PV.

LIFE INSURANCE OVER SEVERAL GENERATIONS: In Longrich, even in the event of death, your beneficiaries continue to benefit from your weekly earnings. Which is not the case when you have a traditional business or you are an employee.
In business, if you are a director and die, your son will not automatically be in your position. The same in a classic business if you are no longer there nothing guarantees that your children will have the same vision as you and will be able to make the business prosper.
We have had examples with a transport company which since the death of its founder fell and came close to bankruptcy. AT LONGRICH YOU WILL NEVER HAVE THIS!!

NOTORIE: Longrich has existed since 1986 and is present everywhere in several countries. In Africa, Longrich has existed for more than 10 years with quality products certified by the Ministry of Health.

MULTITUDE OF ACCOUNTS: At Longrich, you have the possibility of opening several accounts in your name to maximize your earnings with the possibility of assigning an account to your child or a loved one.

EARN MORE THAN YOUR SPONSOR: At Longrich you have the possibility of surpassing the person who made you become member. YES it‚Äôs possible unlike other business models where the first will always earn more than you.
partner_p_4_1: To become a Longrich partner, all you need to do is purchase a product pack. Below are the available packs

car_promo_p_1:
As a Diamond 5,6 or 7, you must also meet the following condition: Each leg must increase by 20% compared to last year at the same period.
For example, if your leg 1 had made 1 000 PV during this period last year, he must have made 1,200 PV during this period to be qualified
car_promo_p_2:
As Start Director, you must also meet the following condition: Each leg must increase by 100% compared to last year at the same period.
For example, if your leg 1 had had 1,000 VP during this period last year, he must have made 2,000 PV during this period to be qualified
car_travel_p:
As a Diamond 5 and above, you must also meet the following condition: Each leg must increase by 25% compared to last year at the same time.
For example, if your leg 1 had 1,000 HP during this period last year, he must have made 1,250 PV during this period to be qualified
